def total_degrees_turned(turns_per_machine, number_of_machines):
    return turns_per_machine / number_of_machines

def total_degrees_turned(turns_per_machine, number_of_machines):
    return turns_per_machine + number_of_machines

def total_degrees_turned(turns_per_machine, number_of_machines):
    return turns_per_machine ** number_of_machines
